title: Migrant caravan: Detained Guatemalan boy dies at Mexico-US border
content: The eight-year-old boy from Guatemala, named as Felipe Alonzo-Gomez, was trying to cross from Mexico.

title: Argentine woman abducted in 1980s freed in Bolivia
content: The woman seized about 32 years ago by people traffickers was rescued in Bolivia after a tip-off.

title: Girl in Trump call still believes in Santa
content: The seven-year-old spoke after the US president threw doubt on the existence of Santa Claus.

title: Syria military says Israel strikes hit Damascus weapons depot
content: Israel has not confirmed the strikes in Syria, but says its air defences fired on a Syrian missile.

title: The Muslim family that looks after a church
content: St Matthew's Church is in a rural area of Pakistan where there are hardly any Christians so it's looked after by a local Muslim family.

title: British-Nigerian wedding MC: I love a good love story
content: British-Nigerian wedding MC Fola ‘Folly Fresh’ Sogbesan on why his heart really is in the job.

title: Parkour's leading lady Silke Sollfrank on quitting gymnastics
content: Silke Sollfrank is a professional athlete who turned her back on gymnastics and found parkour.

title: The Thai cave rescue: What happened next?
content: What happened to the 12 boys and their football coach rescued from a flooded Thai cave in July?

title: Letter from Africa: Africa's history makers in 2018
content: Ethiopia's Prime Minister Abiy has made 2018 a year to remember, writes journalist Elizabeth Ohene.

title: Finding God in the anguish of violence
content: As violence intensifies in Indian-administered Kashmir, people flock to its fabled Sufi shrines.
